Introductory.Heading: Welcome to the Green Measure
Introductory.Objective: This model provides a universal framework for organizations to calculate their greenhouse gas (GHG) footprint. The application is built on the basis of the GHG footprint calculation model of the Ministry of Climate. More information about the use of this model can be found at: https://kliimaministeerium.ee/organisatsioonide-khg-jalajalg

Organization.Heading: Organization Data and Footprint Assessment Scope
Organization.Name: Organization/company name:
Organization.ReportingPeriodStart: Start year of the GHG footprint reporting period:
Organization.ReportingPeriodEnd: End year of the GHG footprint reporting period:

Units.StructuralUnits: Defining the scope of the organization:

Scope.AssessmentScope: Defining the scope of GHG footprint

PageTwo.Heading: Area of Influence 1
PageTwo.VehicleFuelsHeading1: GHG emissions calculated based on fuel type and consumed fuel quantity
PageTwo.VehicleFuelsHeading2: GHG emissions calculated based on fuel type, type of road vehicle, and consumed fuel quantity
PageTwo.VehicleFuelsHeading3: GHG emissions calculated based on car type, fuel type, and mileage
PageTwo.DispersedEmissionsHeading: GHG emissions from the use of fluorinated greenhouse gases

ColumnHeader.VehicleType2: Fuel type, vehicle type, and quantity unit

PageFour.Heading: Area of Influence 3 - Transport
PageFour.BoughtTransportEmissionsHeading: GHG emissions from purchased road transport
PageFour.TrainHeading: GHG emissions from purchased rail transport
PageFour.PlaneHeading: GHG emissions from purchased air transport
PageFour.ShipHeading: GHG emissions from purchased maritime transport

ColumnHeader.RigidTrucks: Rigid truck: size (gross weight), fuel and transport unit
ColumnHeader.ArticulatedTrucks: Articulated truck: size (gross weight), fuel and transport unit
ColumnHeader.ArticulatedRigidTrucks: Unknown truck type and size, fuel and transport unit

PageFive.Heading: M3
PageFive.WorkHomeSmallHeading: Car, bicycle, taxi, motorcycle, moped, on foot
PageFive.WorkHomeLargeHeading: Public transport (bus, tram, trolley, train, taxi)

ColumnHeader.WorkHomeSmall: Mode of transport and fuel type
ColumnHeader.AmountOfHours: Number of home office working hours (h)
ColumnHeader.BoughtOrSold: Is the product purchased or sold?:
ColumnHeader.M1_M2_Emissions: Scope 1 and 2 emissions of the investment or financed project
ColumnHeader.CompanyTotalIncome: Total income of the invested company (€)
ColumnHeader.ProjectBuildingCost: Project construction cost in the reporting year (€)
ColumnHeader.ProjectProfit: Project revenue in the reporting year (€)
ColumnHeader.PercentageOfTotalExpenses: Company's share of the project's total expenses (%)
ColumnHeader.PredictedYearlyEmissions: Projected annual emissions of the project (t CO2 eq)

ColumnHeader.ModelEmissions: Are you using the calculation model's specific emission factor?
ColumnHeader.TotalDistanceAmount: Total tonne-km or km of transport service

ResultsPage.M3Transport: Transport of goods or people purchased
ResultsPage.VehicleFuels: Upstream GHG emissions of vehicle fuels
